MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Graphics.Drawables.Drawable LoadBanner(class Android.Content.PM.PackageManager pm) cil managed

abstract member LoadBanner : Android.Content.PM.PackageManager -> Android.Graphics.Drawables.Drawable override this.LoadBanner : Android.Content.PM.PackageManager -> Android.Graphics.Drawables.Drawable

Docs.param: A PackageManager from which the banner can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Docs.summary: Retrieve the current graphical banner associated with this item.
Docs.returns: Returns a Drawable containing the item's banner. If the item does not have a banner, this method will return null.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Graphics.Drawables.Drawable LoadIcon(class Android.Content.PM.PackageManager pm) cil managed
abstract member LoadIcon : Android.Content.PM.PackageManager -> Android.Graphics.Drawables.Drawable override this.LoadIcon : Android.Content.PM.PackageManager -> Android.Graphics.Drawables.Drawable

Docs.param: A PackageManager from which the icon can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Docs.summary: Retrieve the current graphical icon associated with this item.
Docs.returns: Returns a Drawable containing the item's icon. If the item does not have an icon, the item's default icon is returned such as the default activity icon.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string LoadLabel(class Android.Content.PM.PackageManager pm) cil managed

Docs.param: A PackageManager from which the label can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Docs.summary: Retrieve the current textual label associated with this item.
Docs.returns: Returns a CharSequence containing the item's label. If the item does not have a label, its name is returned.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: A PackageManager from which the icon can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Docs.summary: Retrieve the current graphical icon associated with this item without the addition of a work badge if applicable.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Xml.XmlReader LoadXmlMetaData (Android.Content.PM.PackageManager pm, string name);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlReader LoadXmlMetaData(class Android.Content.PM.PackageManager pm, string name) cil managed
abstract member LoadXmlMetaData : Android.Content.PM.PackageManager * string -> System.Xml.XmlReader override this.LoadXmlMetaData : Android.Content.PM.PackageManager * string -> System.Xml.XmlReader

Docs.param: A PackageManager from which the XML can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Name of the meta-date you would like to load.
Docs.summary: Load an XML resource attached to the meta-data of this item.
Docs.returns: Returns an XmlPullParser you can use to parse the XML file assigned as the given meta-data. If the meta-data name is not defined or the XML resource could not be found, null is returned.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
